data.name: PSet.Name[0yroe0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Pset_SpaceThermalRequirements

data.name: PSet.Definition[0yroe0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Properties related to the comfort requirements for thermal and other thermal related performance properties of spaces that apply to the occurrences of IfcSpace, IfcSpatialZone or IfcZone. It can also be used to capture requirements for IfcSpaceType's. This includes the required design temperature, humidity, ventilation, and air conditioning.

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperature.Name[12pGi0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SpaceTemperature

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperature.Definition[12pGi0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Temperature of the space or zone, that is required from user/designer view point. If no summer or winter space temperature requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period. Provide this value, if no temperatur range (Min-Max) is available.

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureMax.Name[18mkm0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SpaceTemperatureMax

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureMax.Definition[18mkm0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Maximal temperature of the space or zone, that is required from user/designer view point. If no summer or winter space temperature requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period.

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureMin.Name[1EkCq0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SpaceTemperatureMin

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureMin.Definition[1EkCq0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Minimal temperature of the space or zone, that is required from user/designer view point. If no summer or winter space temperature requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period.

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureSummerMax.Name[1K5XU0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SpaceTemperatureSummerMax

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureSummerMax.Definition[1K5XU0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Maximal temperature of the space or zone for the hot (summer) period, that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for cooling.

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureSummerMin.Name[1Q2$Y0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SpaceTemperatureSummerMin

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureSummerMin.Definition[1Q2$Y0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Minimal temperature of the space or zone for the hot (summer) period, that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for cooling.

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureWinterMax.Name[1W0Tc0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SpaceTemperatureWinterMax

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureWinterMax.Definition[1W0Tc0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Maximal temperature of the space or zone for the cold (winter) period, that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for heating.

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureWinterMin.Name[1bzxg0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SpaceTemperatureWinterMin

data.name: Property.SpaceTemperatureWinterMin.Definition[1bzxg0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Minimal temperature of the space or zone for the cold (winter) period, that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for heating.

data.name: Property.SpaceHumidity.Name[1hxPk0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SpaceHumidity

data.name: Property.SpaceHumidity.Definition[1hxPk0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Humidity of the space or zone that is required from user/designer view point. If no summer or winter space humidity requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period. Provide this property, if no humidity range (Min-Max) is available.

data.name: Property.SpaceHumidityMax.Name[1mia_0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SpaceHumidityMax

data.name: Property.SpaceHumidityMax.Definition[1mia_0qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Maximal permitted humidity of the space or zone that is required from user/designer view point. If no summer or winter space humidity requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period.

data.name: Property.SpaceHumidityMin.Name[1sg320qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SpaceHumidityMin

data.name: Property.SpaceHumidityMin.Definition[1sg320qWmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Minimal permitted humidity of the space or zone that is required from user/designer view point. If no summer or winter space humidity requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period.

data.name: Property.SpaceHumiditySummer.Name[]
data.value: SpaceHumiditySummer

data.name: Property.SpaceHumiditySummer.Definition[]
data.value: Humidity of the space or zone for the hot (summer) period, that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for cooling.

data.name: Property.SpaceHumidityWinter.Name[]
data.value: SpaceHumidityWinter

data.name: Property.SpaceHumidityWinter.Definition[]
data.value: Humidity of the space or zone for the cold (winter) period that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for heating.

data.name: Property.DiscontinuedHeating.Name[]
data.value: DiscontinuedHeating

data.name: Property.DiscontinuedHeating.Definition[]
data.value: Indication whether discontinued heating is required/desirable from user/designer view point. (TRUE) if yes, (FALSE) otherwise.

data.name: Property.NaturalVentilation.Name[]
data.value: NaturalVentilation

data.name: Property.NaturalVentilation.Definition[]
data.value: Indication whether the space is required to have natural ventilation (TRUE) or mechanical ventilation (FALSE).

data.name: Property.NaturalVentilationRate.Name[]
data.value: NaturalVentilationRate

data.name: Property.NaturalVentilationRate.Definition[]
data.value: Indication of the requirement of a particular natural air ventilation rate, given in air changes per hour.

data.name: Property.MechanicalVentilationRate.Name[]
data.value: MechanicalVentilationRate

data.name: Property.MechanicalVentilationRate.Definition[]
data.value: Indication of the requirement of a particular mechanical air ventilation rate, given in air changes per hour.

data.name: Property.AirConditioning.Name[]
data.value: AirConditioning

data.name: Property.AirConditioning.Definition[]
data.value: Indication whether this space requires air conditioning provided (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

data.name: Property.AirConditioningCentral.Name[]
data.value: AirConditioningCentral

data.name: Property.AirConditioningCentral.Definition[]
data.value: Indication whether the space requires a central air conditioning provided (TRUE) or not (FALSE).It should only be given, if the property "AirConditioning" is set to TRUE.
